content: Go straight up toward the valley, but be careful as you explore the area. Some of the rocks in this area glow with lava, and that's because they're actually Searing-Fire enemies. These resemble the Palestones from Chapter 2 and are particularly annoying. They will leap in the air and drop on their back and front to cause explosions. For the sake of unlocking portraits, you can defeat just one and ignore the others.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Go straight up toward the valley, but be careful as you explore the area. Some of the rocks in this area glow with lava, and that's because they're actually Searing-Fire enemies. These resemble the Palestones from Chapter 2 and are particularly annoying. They will leap in the air and drop on their back and front to cause explosions. For the sake of unlocking portraits, you can defeat just one and ignore the others.
